response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is valued at $15,000 by you. I am offering it to you today at a special price of $12,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that exceeds your expectations and delivers significant value. I believe this price reflects the quality and benefits you will receive. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
